getJobMigrations

public java.util.List getJobMigrations(JobMigrationType type)
Returns all the job migrations of the given type. If type is null, returns all job records known to the service.

Parameters:
type - The job migration type
Returns:
The list of job migrations
See Also:
JobMigration

getJobMigrations

public java.util.List getJobMigrations(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user,
                                       JobMigrationType type)
Returns all the job migrations of the given type associated with the given user. If type is null, returns all job records associated with the given user.

Parameters:
user - The user
type - The job migration type
Returns:
The job migrations belonging to the given user
